segments.text: Henry , I want to ask you something .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Say what you want to say .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You see . The wage is not paid yet , I am wondering if you could possibly lend me some money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry . But I do not have any money to lend to you .
segments.speaker: S2
